item.title: Armazenando as configurações do aplicativo
item.description: Adicionando um valor # //Add value to Isolated Storage Settings IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Add("Key", "Value"); Verificando se existe um valor # //Check if a value exists in settings already if (IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Contains("Key")) { //perform logic } Lendo o valor # string setting = IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings["Key"] as string; Salvando as configurações # IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Save();
